text: [Music]
hey guys
angel today we are making a sliced lamb
dish and it is super delicious it's one
of my favorite Taiwanese dishes even
though I have a lot of favorite
Taiwanese dishes but today we are going
to be making a Taiwanese style sliced
lamb with barbecue sauce and water
spinach all stir-fried together and two
of the ingredients you may not be as
familiar with one which is water spinach
and I have some fresh water spinach
right here it's also known in Mandarin
as home students high water spinach is
an Asian vegetable it's kind of crunchy
when stir-fried right and when I say it
crunchy I mean it's super addicting when
you eat it you'll know what I mean if
you've had it before the second
ingredient is an Asian barbecue sauce
now this barbecue sauce tastes nothing
like American barbecue sauce it is very
very savory it's got flavors of soy
garlic shallots and it's delicious and
perfect in the stir-fry so if you're
interested in a new slice alone recipe
to try keep watching for the fresh
ingredients you'll need some water
spinach which is sometimes labeled as
own choy at the grocery stores I am also
using half a pound of lamb meat three
cloves of garlic and if you like a bit
of spice some red chilies to taste first
I'm going to start by slicing the lamb
into thin bite-sized pieces against the
grain slicing against the grain of the
meat really helps in making it more
tender so guys don't forget this step
when you're done transfer the lamb to a
mixing bowl and add one teaspoon of rice
wine 1 teaspoon of light soy sauce and 2
teaspoons of organic cane sugar then
give that a quick stir and let the lab
marinate for about 20 minutes while we
prepare the other ingredients next let's
prep the garlic I'm using my trusty
silicone garlic peeler which I'll leave
you guys a link in the video description
if you're interested
and instead of mincing the garlic this
time I'm going to trim off the top and
make thin slices I know I know I'm going
to have garlic press later but I love
garlic and it's totally worth it
after the garlic let's prep the water
spinach I typically trim the bottom
stalks a few inches up then discard
depending on how those look next cut the
stalks into two to three inch pieces for
the stir-fry and as with all vegetables
you want to give them a good rinse and
washing before use next we'll need some
chicken broth I typically take a quarter
cup of hot water and mix in and dissolve
a small amount of chicken bullion for a
quick and easy broth this liquid will
help with cooking the vegetables in my
wok and make the dish more flavorful and
finally if you're okay with a bit of
spice I really think a few slices of red
pepper goes a long way in bringing out
the flavors of the sauce now we're ready
to cook pre-heat your wok over high heat
add a bit of oil along with the lamb and
we're going to sear and stir-fry the
meat until it's about 65% done a little
pink is okay at this point because we're
going to be adding it back then remove
the lamb and set aside while we start to
cook the vegetables in the same wok I'm
going to add more oil then the garlic
and give that a quick stir before
incorporating the water spinach and
finally the chicken broth now just
stir-fry the veggies for one to two
minutes or until the leafy portions are
just wilted at that time you can add in
the barbecue sauce now if you're new to
this type of Asian barbecue sauce make
sure to give it a good stir in the
container to mix the bits at the bottom
with the oil on top before measuring I'm
using two tablespoons which I'm going to
add in the stir-fry then when it's
dissolved I'll incorporate the lamb and
my sliced chillies stir fry for another
minute to allow everything to finish
cooking and when it's done it's ready to
serve hot with some white rice
[Music]
and that guys is how you make Taiwanese
sliced lamb with barbecue sauce it is
super delicious I can smell it in the
kitchen right now it is so good and I am
gonna do a quick taste test Wow
so I don't know if the microphone could
pick that up but the water spinach was
super crunchy very crisp and it was
delicious
I love veggies like this and the lamb
along with the barbecue sauce and the
slight hint of chilies it was just
perfect
super savory very delicious this is
great with the bowl of hot rice anyways
I hope you guys enjoyed today's video if
you do end up trying this sly flam
recipe don't forget to come back and
post in the comments below or tag me on
instagram at angel cooks food and let me
know how you like this dish until then
take care guys and I will see you in the
next one bye for now
[Music]
you
